name: Resident Evil 4: Zeebo Edition
summary:
Resident Evil 4: Zeebo Edition is an adaptation of the mobile phone game Resident Evil 4: Mobile Edition released for the Brazilian Zeebo console in 2009.

This version could be purchased digitally through the ZeeboNet using Z-Credits to be played on the console. Due to the fact that the console was discontinued and its ZeeboNet connection system stopped working in 2011, it is impossible to purchase this video game, although the game still works on those consoles where the title was purchased at the time.
